pages.faq: FloorVibes - Your Flooring Destination in India | FAQ Home Catalog FAQ FAQS What types of flooring materials do you offer? A: We offer a wide range of flooring materials including hardwood, laminate, vinyl, ceramic tiles, carpets, and natural stone. Do you provide installation services? A: Yes, we offer professional installation services for all the flooring products we sell. Can I request a sample before making a purchase? A: Yes, we provide samples of our flooring materials upon request to help you make an informed decision. Are your products eco-friendly? A: We offer a selection of eco-friendly flooring options, including bamboo and cork, that are sustainable and environmentally responsible. What is the warranty on your flooring products? A: The warranty varies depending on the product, but we ensure that all our products come with a warranty to guarantee quality and durability. Do you offer customization options for carpets and rugs? A: Yes, we provide customization services for carpets and rugs, allowing you to choose the size, shape, and design according to your preferences. Can I install hardwood flooring in my kitchen or bathroom? A: While hardwood flooring is not recommended for areas prone to moisture, we offer alternative options such as luxury vinyl tiles or ceramic tiles suitable for wet areas. How do I maintain and clean my flooring? A: We provide care and maintenance instructions for each type of flooring material to ensure longevity and optimal performance. What is the difference between laminate and hardwood flooring? A: Laminate flooring is a synthetic product designed to mimic the look of hardwood, offering greater durability and resistance to moisture at a lower cost. Can I install flooring over existing flooring? A: In most cases, yes, but it depends on the condition of the existing flooring and the type of new flooring you choose. We recommend consulting with our experts for guidance. Do you offer financing options for large purchases? A: Yes, we provide financing options to help make your purchase more affordable. Please inquire with our sales team for details. How long does the installation process take? A: The installation time varies depending on the size of the project and the type of flooring. Our team will provide you with an estimated timeline before starting the installation. Do you offer free estimates? A: Yes, we offer free estimates for all our products and services. Simply contact us to schedule an appointment. Are your products suitable for commercial spaces? A: Yes, we offer commercial-grade flooring solutions suitable for various commercial settings, including offices, retail stores, and restaurants. What sets FloorVibes apart from other flooring retailers? A: At FloorVibes, we pride ourselves on offering high-quality products, expert guidance, exceptional customer service, and a wide selection of flooring options to suit every style and budget. About Us At FloorVibes, we believe that the foundation of a beautiful home starts with quality flooring. With over two decades of experience in the flooring industry, we have honed our expertise to become a leading provider of premium flooring solutions in the region. Our journey began with a simple vision: to offer homeowners and businesses access to a wide range of flooring options that combine exceptional quality, aesthetic appeal, and durability. Over the years, we have stayed true to this vision, continually expanding our product offerings and refining our services to meet the evolving needs of our customers. What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to excellence. From the moment you step into our showroom to the completion of your flooring project, we strive to provide a seamless and enjoyable experience. Our team of knowledgeable professionals is here to guide you every step of the way, offering expert advice and personalized recommendations to help you find the perfect flooring solution for your space. But our dedication goes beyond just delivering quality products. We understand that choosing the right flooring is an investment, which is why we go above and beyond to ensure that you are fully satisfied with your purchase. From providing detailed product information to offering reliable installation services, we are here to make your flooring journey as smooth and stress-free as possible. At FloorVibes, we are more than just a flooring company – we are your partners in creating the home of your dreams. Whether you are renovating your entire house or simply updating a single room, you can trust us to provide the expertise, selection, and service you need to bring your vision to life. Contacts C/17, 2nd floor SDA market, opposite main IIT gate, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India floorvibes@gmail.com +911146563814 Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions Links Home Catalog FAQ

pages.privacy: FloorVibes - Your Flooring Destination in India | Privacy Policy Home Catalog FAQ Privacy Policy Introduction Your privacy is important to us. It is FloorVibes' policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, and other sites we own and operate. Information We Collect We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so – for example, to provide our services, to communicate with you, or to make our services better. We collect this information from three sources: if and when you provide information to us, automatically through operating our services, and from outside sources. How We Use Information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners Send you emails Find and prevent fraud Log Data We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our website or when you access our website through a mobile device ("Log Data"). This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our website that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, and other statistics. Cookies Cookies are files with a small amount of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your computer's hard drive. We use "cookies" to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website. Security The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Links to Other Sites Our website may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. Children's Privacy Our website does not address anyone under the age of 13 ("Children"). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children have provided us with Personal Information, please contact us. If we discover that a Children under 13 has provided us with Personal Information, we will delete such information from our servers immediately. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us: By email: floorvibes@gmail.com Contacts C/17, 2nd floor SDA market, opposite main IIT gate, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India floorvibes@gmail.com +911146563814 Policy Privacy policy Terms and Conditions Links Home Catalog FAQ
